name: Jumper (Rain)
description:
Skellyton is cold! Will you help him find a jumper to keep warm?

CONTROLS:

  • WASD - move
  • SPACE - jump
  • ESCAPE - quit

This game was made for Miziziz's asset jam, using this game asset pack. This is my first 3d game (and my first game made in Godot!) so I hope what it lacks in polish it makes up for with skellytons.
